text: Grachan Moncur III (June 3, 1937 – June 3, 2022) was an American jazz trombonist. Moncur toured with Ray Charles (1959–62), Art Farmer and Benny Golson's Jazztet (1962), and Sonny Rollins. Moncur died on June 3, 2022, his 85th birthday, at his home in Newark, New Jersey from cardiac arrest. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American jazz musicians Category:American trombonists Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Musicians from Newark, New Jersey Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Grachan Moncur III
